test.name: 01b Some DNF Form concepts actually exist

parameter.name: query
parameter.value: select count(*) from <PROSPECTIVE>.concept_active where id in (select sourceid from rf2_cr_transitiveclosuretable where destinationId = 30383011000036100 or sourceid = 30383011000036100);

parameter.name: query

test.name: 04 All concepts that are types of 30383011000036100|Form have semantic tag (AU qualifier)

parameter.name: query
parameter.value: select * from <PROSPECTIVE>.description_active where isActiveConcept_cr(conceptId) AND isKindOf_cr(conceptId,30383011000036100) and typeId = 900000000000003001 and SUBSTRING(term,-14,14) != '(AU qualifier)';

test.name: 05b DNF Form(30383011000036100) is only a child of 30515011000036103|Australian qualifier

parameter.name: query
parameter.value: select * from <PROSPECTIVE>.relationship_<SNAPSHOT> where sourceId = 30383011000036100 and typeId = 116680003 and destinationId != 30515011000036103;

test.name: 08b DNF Form concepts only have 116680003|Is a relationships

parameter.name: query

test.name: 07b DNF Form subtypes only have destinationId that are types of 30383011000036100|Form
10b All DNF Form concept relationships are ungrouped (group = 0)

parameter.name: query
